Spaghetti Carbonara.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with spaghetti, guanciale or pancetta, egg, Pecorino Romano cheese, and black pepper.

Margherita Pizza.description: Traditional pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and olive oil.

Lasagna.description: Layered pasta dish with ground beef, tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and fresh parsley.

Risotto alla Milanese.description: Creamy saffron-infused risotto with Arborio rice, onion, white wine, Parmesan cheese, and butter.

Osso Buco.description: Braised veal shanks with a rich tomato and white wine sauce, served with gremolata.
